sentences.sContent: He has accused local people of trying to besmirch his reputation.
sentences.sCn: 他指责当地人企图败坏他的名誉。

remMethod.val: be + smirch(污点， 弄脏) → 诽谤

trans.tranOther: If you besmirch someone or their reputation, you say that they are a bad person or that they have done something wrong, usually when this is not true
